<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Spark Bat](/Monsters.aspx?ID=646)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Spark bats congregate around volatile weather in the Plane of Air.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Elemental](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2), [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 16

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 11
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 2">[Spark Bat](/Monsters.aspx?ID=646)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Tiny" />
<trait label="Air" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=5" />
<trait label="Elemental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=57" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=32) pg. 106 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Perception** +7; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +9, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +9

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +0

**Dex** +3

**Con** +1

**Int** -4

**Wis** +1

**Cha** +0
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 19 

**Fort** +5 

**Ref** +11 

**Will** +7 

</row>

**HP** 18

**Immunities**
bleed, electricity, [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [sleep](/Traits.aspx?ID=145)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 5 feet, fly 50 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +11 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 1d4+5 electricity

**Arc Lightning**  ([Move](/Traits.aspx?ID=114), [Electricity](/Traits.aspx?ID=56), [Primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134), [Transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157)) The spark bat transforms into lightning that arcs to a large piece of metal within 100 feet, such as a suit of metal armor or a metal weapon. The bat then returns to its normal form in a space adjacent to the metal. This movement doesn't trigger reactions.

</column>
